name: 9 Seconds of Blood (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
name_original: 9 Seconds of Blood (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Nine Seconds of Blood is a fast-paced puzzle game where you play as a vampire.  The twist?  You only have 9 seconds before you stave to death!

Race your way through the mansion, feeding upon servants to stave off your hunger.  Discover hidden upgrade and side routes, and carefully determine when and where it is best to feed!

This is the eighth entry in my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily progress updates!
